attributes.action: create a law which bans all payments from lobbying firms to Members of Parliament and Peers of the Realm, and that any Members found recieving money will be stripped of their pension rights
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unelected people have too much power in Westminster. Lobbyists have huge resources to coax and entice MPs to their point of view. My petition is simple, ban all donations from lobbying firms to MPs or PPCs and any who have found to have taken money will immediatly lose their parliamentary pensions
